text: @BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson Hey Bernie-why did you miss the important Coronavirus vote today in the senate? You missed one last week also. Is your online tele campaigning event MORE Important than Americans???? You don't sound OR ACT like a Leader!! #DropoutBernie
